function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2 in indoor climate-controlled environments","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread and transmission","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems, implementing air purification technologies, and promoting respiratory hygiene","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV germicidal irradiation, and advanced HVAC systems","People":"Managers, employees, and individuals in indoor environments","Owner":"Facility managers, employers, and regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate implementation of COVID-19 health regulations in workplaces","Impact":"Increased risk of virus outbreaks and transmission among workers","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to international and national health regulations, regular monitoring and enforcement of protocols, and employee education on COVID-19 prevention","Technologies":"Digital monitoring systems, contactless access control, and communication platforms for safety protocols","People":"Employers, workers, and occupational health services","Owner":"Employers, regulatory authorities, and occupational health services"}]}
